cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 85 mi ESE of Progreso, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating north-north-eastward across the central Gulf toward the northern Gulf Coast, then inland across MS/AL and the Southeast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southeast Louisiana to Mississippi coast (near Buras-Port Fourchon area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: West of Morgan City to Intracoastal City, Louisiana (T.S. Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City LA to MS/AL border; Tropical Storm Warning MS/AL border to Okaloosa/Walton County Line FL; Storm-Surge Warning Intracoastal City LA to Navarre FL including Mobile Bay
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire northern Gulf Coast from Louisiana to the western Florida Panhandle, including Mobile Bay
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds likely (40–60 mph gusts) with a 53 % cumulative chance of ≥34 kt and up to a 17 % chance of ≥50 kt winds.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 2–4 ft inundation possible along Dauphin Island, Mobile Bay, and neighboring coasts.
weather_observation.rainfall: 2–4 inches with isolated 6 inches could cause flash and urban flooding around Mobile Bay.
weather_observation.other_hazards: A few tornadoes are possible Wednesday and Wednesday night across southern Alabama.
